self.title: CDISC Questionnaire FBRSI Test Code Terminology

definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Brain Symptom Index test code.
name: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Brain Symptom Index Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire FBRSI Test Code Terminology
synonyms: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Brain Symptom Index Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Brain Symptom Index - I get headaches.
Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Brain Symptom Index - I have had seizures (convulsions).
Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Brain Symptom Index - I have weakness in my arms or legs.
terms.preferredTerm: FBRSI - Have Weakness in My Arms or Legs
synonyms: FAC029-Have Weakness in My Arms or Legs

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Brain Symptom Index - I need help in caring for myself (bathing, dressing, eating, etc.).
terms.preferredTerm: FBRSI - I Need Help in Caring for Myself
synonyms: FAC029-I Need Help in Caring for Myself

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Brain Symptom Index - I have a lack of energy.
terms.preferredTerm: FBRSI - I Have a Lack of Energy
synonyms: FAC029-I Have a Lack of Energy

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Brain Symptom Index - I have difficulty expressing my thoughts.
Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Brain Symptom Index - I have trouble with coordination.
terms.preferredTerm: FBRSI - I Have Trouble With Coordination

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Brain Symptom Index - I get frustrated that I cannot do things I used to.
terms.preferredTerm: FBRSI - Frustrated I Cannot Do Things

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Brain Symptom Index - I have nausea.
Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Brain Symptom Index - I am able to find the right word(s) to say what I mean.
terms.preferredTerm: FBRSI - Able to Find the Right Words
synonyms: FAC029-Able to Find the Right Words

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Brain Symptom Index - I am losing hope in the fight against my illness.
Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Brain Symptom Index - Because of my physical condition, I have trouble meeting the needs of my family.
terms.preferredTerm: FBRSI - Trouble Meeting Needs of Family

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Brain Symptom Index - I worry that my condition will get worse.
terms.preferredTerm: FBRSI - Worry My Condition Will Get Worse
synonyms: FAC029-Worry My Condition Will Get Worse

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Brain Symptom Index - I am afraid of having a seizure (convulsion).
terms.preferredTerm: FBRSI - I Am Afraid of Having a Seizure
synonyms: FAC029-I Am Afraid of Having a Seizure

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy-Brain Symptom Index - I am able to enjoy life.
terms.preferredTerm: FBRSI - I Am Able to Enjoy Life
synonyms: FAC029-I Am Able to Enjoy Life
